title: Moores Creek National Battlefield: Our Staff & Offices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices       Do you need to contact a Ranger? Please see the park management staff information below to identify who is responsible for what at Moores Creek National Battlefield and they would be glad to assist you with your needs. Ricardo Perez, Park Superintendent Phone:910-283-5591 x2224 Email:e-mail us   James Sutton, Integrated Resource Manager & Acting Chief of Facilities Phone:910-283-5591 x2229 Email:e-mail us   Matthew Woods, Chief of Interpretation, Education and Volunteers & Park Special Use Reservations Phone:910-283-5591 x2222 Email:e-mail us
